value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new Power BI session to demonstrate the new feature which is just been rolled out by Microsoft. Now, we can quickly create reports using the Power BI Service itself. value.title: Show Multiple X Axis Value By Hierarchy in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI September 2022 Feature Summary. During this video we will learn how we can show multiple X-axis value as hierarchy in Power BI. value.title: Show Total in Stacked Bar and Column Chart in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this video, we will learn how we can show total value in a stacked bar chart and stacked column chart in Power BI. value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to try Power BI, but not sure where to start? I look at some ways you can get up and running with Power BI quickly. value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.
